alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 4:02AM MST until December 28 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Utah, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 4 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
